Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Hevn::
       He delayed slightly before leaving Maxima to return to the base.  He 
gets most of the way to the base before he realizes he was never given 
clearance.  This fact is made quite clear when the first autocannon clips his wing and 
sends him spiraling down into the woods.  He groans and scrambles out of 
range, opening a comlink to Blackstorm while en route.  "Hi, Blackstorm, Hevn 
here.  Could you do me a big favor and let me inside?  You see they never got 
around to programming the defenses to recognize me."

--part1_79.124cd1e3.2c0ce5d0_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
